name: Tamadoggi
description:
Take care of your own virtual dog!

Controls:

The game can be played using the keyboard or by clicking on the virtual buttons.

WASDA / Arrow Keys: Left, Right, Up Down

1, 2, 3: Home, Shop, Game

Enter / Space: Action button

Take care of your pet's needs at the home screen. Press the Action button to take care of Doggi's needs.  Doggi cannot play games or go shopping if they need some help!

Two cute items are currently available at the shop, glasses and a bow!

There are three games that are randomly selected when pressing the Game button.

Balloon Drop: Don't let the balloon touch the ground! Move Doggi left or right to keep the balloon up.

Bone Collect: Bones are buried throughout the yard! Move around the screen to collect them once Doggi sniffs them out.

Slots: Press the Action button to hit the slot. Get three in a row to get a big prize! Hit a cat and there will be no reward.
